channel.title: Hosting the server
channel.description: i need to know if it is possible to host 2 different servers example(123 speced) and (lava burn isle) at the same time heres pick of what i got [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg97/2g0d4u/Untitled-6.jpg[/img]

item.title: Hosting the server
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

[quote=“projectpkerz, post:8, topic:186629”][quote author=Ixl Adds Ixl link=topic=249103.msg2090400#msg2090400 date=1204778008]
So…you 2 “friends…” stay together? LOL! lol 2 dudes sharing a house, i thought I would never hear that comment via internet ever.

me and my friend r on dif comps at the same house
so he hosts his server on his comp and i host one myself

[/quote]i had 3 friends liveing in my house exept one was a chick =] giggi giigigi gi[/quote]

thats better…2 guys in a ‘house’ (apartments excluded) is gay. At least you got some kind of jug to look at in the morning. ;D

Read full topic
